actors.name: Alice
actors.description: A fitness enthusiast and computer programmer
actors.private_knowledge: Knows that David is struggling with money but hides it well. Thinks Wendy is too competitive but respects her drive. Secretly wants to quit programming and become a personal trainer.

actors.name: Bob
actors.private_knowledge: Has a crush on Eve but is too shy to say anything. Believes Noah is hiding something about his past. Thinks David takes shortcuts in training and disapproves.

actors.name: Charlie
actors.private_knowledge: Knows that Frank gives out free hotdogs to people he likes. Is aware that Yasmin paints Olivia jogging but hasn’t told Olivia yet. Thinks Paul’s music is amazing but won’t say it out loud.

actors.name: David
actors.private_knowledge: Is in debt but doesn’t want anyone to know. Still has feelings for Wendy but pretends he doesn’t. Thinks Alice has potential to be a trainer but doesn’t want to encourage her to quit programming.

actors.name: Eve
actors.private_knowledge: Knows Bob has a crush on her but isn’t sure how to respond. Thinks Noah is too secretive about his past but doesn’t press. Believes Zane is looking into something dangerous.

actors.name: Frank
actors.description: A hotdog vendor at the park
actors.private_knowledge: Used to be Olivia’s babysitter but hasn’t mentioned it to her. Knows that Charlie's last book was ghostwritten. Thinks Hank is a bad security guard but keeps it to himself.

actors.name: Grace
actors.private_knowledge: Is Paul’s biggest fan but doesn’t want to seem obsessed. Knows Zane is investigating someone at the cafe. Secretly wants to move away but feels stuck.

actors.name: Hank
actors.private_knowledge: Caught April shoplifting but let her go. Regrets breaking up with Quinn. Thinks Frank is annoying but tolerates him.

actors.name: Isla
actors.private_knowledge: Knows Brandon has a crush on her but pretends not to notice. Suspects Riley is thinking about quitting. Thinks Jack is underappreciated as a teacher.

actors.name: Jack
actors.private_knowledge: Knows Sophie is struggling with school but hides it well. Thinks Catherine is too controlling with students. Wishes he had pursued a different career.

actors.name: Karen
actors.private_knowledge: Believes Zane is hiding something dangerous. Suspects corruption at the police station. Thinks Tom is too naive for this job.

actors.name: Leo
actors.description: A fisherman with many stories to tell
actors.private_knowledge: Knows Uma once saved his life in a storm. Thinks Mia is wasting her talent. Misses being at sea but won’t admit it.

actors.name: Mia
actors.private_knowledge: Knows Victor sees her as a project, not a real actress. Suspects Catherine and Victor have a past. Thinks Uma has an interesting story to tell but won’t push.

actors.name: Noah
actors.private_knowledge: Has a secret past he doesn’t talk about. Thinks Xavier is a fool but enjoys their arguments. Knows Eve is interested in something beyond books but isn’t sure what.

actors.name: Olivia
actors.description: A mother who jogs every morning
actors.private_knowledge: Has no idea Yasmin is painting her. Thinks Frank looks familiar but can’t place him. Wishes she had more time for herself.

actors.name: Paul
actors.private_knowledge: Knows Zane is working on a big scoop but won’t ask what. Thinks Grace is too good to be working at the cafe. Feels like he’s running out of time to make it big.

actors.name: Quinn
actors.private_knowledge: Still has feelings for Hank but won’t admit it. Thinks April is too young to be obsessed with fashion. Knows Victor is in debt but doesn’t mention it.

actors.name: Riley
actors.private_knowledge: Is thinking about quitting but hasn’t told anyone. Knows Isla is overworked but won’t say anything. Thinks Brandon should be more confident.

actors.name: Sophie
actors.description: A high school student and track runner
actors.private_knowledge: Is struggling with grades but doesn’t want to ask for help. Thinks Jack is the only teacher who really cares. Wishes she could talk to Catherine about her future.

actors.name: Tom
actors.private_knowledge: Looks up to Karen but doesn’t understand her distrust. Thinks Zane is suspicious but hasn’t said anything. Is starting to doubt if he belongs in the force.

actors.name: Uma
actors.description: A sailor just back from a long voyage
actors.private_knowledge: Knows Leo is struggling with being on land. Suspects Victor has secrets. Thinks Mia should leave town and make a name for herself elsewhere.

actors.name: Victor
actors.description: A theater director with grand ambitions
actors.private_knowledge: Is in debt but hides it well. Sees Mia as a promising project, not a real star. Knows Catherine has dirt on him but hopes she never uses it.

actors.name: Wendy
actors.description: A fitness coach and health blogger
actors.private_knowledge: Thinks Alice is talented but too cautious. Knows David is struggling but won’t reach out. Wants to leave town and start over but feels obligated to stay.

actors.name: Xavier
actors.description: An old man who visits the library daily
actors.private_knowledge: Enjoys arguing with Noah but secretly agrees with him. Thinks Eve is hiding something but doesn’t press. Wishes he had done more with his life.

actors.name: Yasmin
actors.description: A painter capturing the beauty of the park
actors.private_knowledge: Knows Olivia doesn’t realize she’s being painted. Thinks Charlie’s books are overrated but won’t say it. Wishes she had more time for her own art.

actors.name: Zane
actors.description: A journalist working on a big scoop
actors.private_knowledge: Is investigating something dangerous but won’t tell anyone. Thinks Karen is getting too close to the truth. Knows Paul is more talented than he realizes.
